abstract: The wave of selling that sent the world’s stock markets sharply lower on Tuesday continued in Asia on Wednesday, with the Nikkei 225 down more than 2 percent by lunchtime in Tokyo.
snippet: The wave of selling that sent the world’s stock markets sharply lower on Tuesday continued in Asia on Wednesday, with the Nikkei 225 down more than 2 percent by lunchtime in Tokyo.
lead_paragraph: The wave of selling that sent the world’s stock markets sharply lower on Tuesday continued in Asia on Wednesday, with the Nikkei 225 down more than 2 percent by lunchtime in Tokyo, as investors fretted about just how strong — or feeble — the global economic recovery would be.

headline.main: Asian Stocks Buckle Under Worldwide Slump

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
